title: Baba Game
controls: Click on the map to select regions and complete challenges. Use mouse to navigate through different levels.

title: Bun Eating Contest
description: A fun bun eating contest game
controls: Click and drag to interact with objects. Use mouse to navigate through the eating contest.

title: Steps of Wonder
description: A fun Steps of Wonder game
controls: Use arrow keys or WASD to move. Space bar to jump. Navigate through challenging platforms.

title: Beat the Cat
controls: Click or tap on the cats to beat them. Quick reflexes needed to achieve high scores!

title: Snake Game
description: Classic snake game - eat food and grow longer
controls: Use arrow keys to control the snake. Eat food to grow longer, avoid hitting walls or yourself.

title: Space Shooter
controls: Use arrow keys to move your spaceship. Space bar to shoot. Destroy all enemies to win!

title: Tetris Game
controls: Arrow keys to move and rotate blocks. Down arrow to drop faster. Clear lines to score points.

title: Tower Defense
description: Strategic tower defense game - protect your base
controls: Click to place towers along the path. Upgrade towers to increase damage. Stop enemies from reaching your base!
